verbs.description: [V: irving] [ARG1: scores 28 celtics] beat bucks 117 - 113 kyrie irving scored 28 points making six of boston franchise record 24 3-pointers as the celtics knocked off the last unbeaten team in the nba with a 117 - 113 win over the milwaukee bucks on thursday night eric bledsoe milwaukee bucks gordon hayward alex cora boston irving national basketball association nba kyrie irving celtics milwaukee giannis antetokounmpo boston celtics
